title: My KDP Amazon Keyword Research Method
description:
Are you looking to find more profitable keywords for your Amazon Kdp book listings?
It can be overwhelming to know how many are even enough. But there is a bigger problem we need to talk about. And that is the exact problem you are solving with your book. 
The problem you are solving with your book should dictate the type of keywords you use in your Amazon KDP listing and metadata backend keywords. 
You want your book to be ranked organically but you also want to find new keywords from that book's sales to help you build out a brand around those highly profitable Amazon Kdp keywords. 
Think about niching down on Amazon KDP similar to any business model. Publish consistently in a niche where you can create great solutions for your customers which results in more sales, higher ranking and better more thoughtful reviews.
In this video, I'm going to show you my method for researching profitable keywords on Amazon Kindle Direct Publishing (KDP). This video will teach you how to find low- co
